name: RUN & BREATHE
description:
This was a game made in 5 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

You use the chaotic environment, specifically your enemies, to gain advantage turning yourself into a dragon to cause even more and to complete the level.

Controls:

  • as Human
  1.  Space bar to jump
  2.  Use mouse to look
  • as Dragon
  1.  Hold Space bar to fly up
  2.  Hold Shift to fly down
  3.  Hold Left Mouse to breathe fire
  • Both
  1.  WASD to move
  2.  Escape  key to pause/resume

Credits:
